name: Flappy Cock
description:
Like Flappy birds But with more cock! 

What the last update Included

Audio:

Sounds have been added.

User experience:

A Quit button has been added.

Splash Screens:

Both Unity and Wing It Medias Splash Screen has been updated.

A Credit Page has been Added.

Future Plans are:

Add More variation with the Pillers.

Changing Buttons so that they both Fit within a theme.

The next update will see the mobile version of the game.
